name: Capital FM Malawi
description:
Malawi's number one urban News, Business and Hit Music station.
Capital FM is a privately owned Adult Contemporary English Radio Station that was launched 29th March 1999.
	Show more

name: Timveni Online
description:
Timveni is a child and youth media organization, which comprises of a radio, and a TV. The media house and organization aims to give opportunity for children and the youths to reach out to the nation in advocating for their own rights.
Timveni Radio broadcasts on the following frequencies:
Lilongwe 103.2 MHZ, Karonga 99.3 MHZ, Thyolo 87.5 MHZ,Mzimba 97.5 MHz,Dedza 90.3 MHZ,Dowa 103.2 MHZ

name: Radio Maria
description: RADIO MARIA is a broadcasting initiative, which was started in Italy by a group of Catholics, both priests and lay people. It aims at spreading the Good News of Jesus Christ to all people of good will. The radio is not commercially funded through advertisement, but lives solely by means of the generous donations of its listeners and the contributions of its volunteers.

name: Power FM101
description: Malawi's 1st independent radio station, dedicated to playing 101% pure music and sporting events from across the world.

name: Ndirande FM
description:
Ndirande FM brings factual, professional, objective and responsible radio programming and online news.
Ndirande FM - "Kuti Mumve Zenizeni Zake".

name: Chisomo Radio Station
description: Chisomo Radio Station’s current footprint embraces dominance of listenership and is lakeshore's biggest radio station directly serving the community,being the most popular mass media vehicle. CRS provides an established platform from which service product & service providers  can increase mileage and realize cost recovery rapidity, at minimal rates, by bringing products and services to the attention of the central region’s urban, Peri-urban and rural communities.

name: Mlatho Radio
description: Mlatho Radio a dynamic online power station creating cutting edge music and trending celebrity News .

name: Hitz Radio Malawi
description: Hitz Radio Malawi

name: Radio Alinafe Archdiocese Of Lilongwe
description:
Radio Alinafe is an archdiocesan regional community Radio station based at Maula Catholic cathedral campus.It is a catholic Radio.
You can get Radio Alinafe on 97.1 FM in Lilongwe and surrounding areas; 96.3 FM in Dowa and surrounding areas.
Radio Alinafe workers are largely volunteers.
Radio Alinafe, envisions being a professionally effective instrument of establishing communities that will witness to the Gospel and bring about Justice,Peace,Love and Unity in the light of the Word of God.

name: Beyond FM Malawi
description: Beyond FM.More Than Radio

name: Angaliba FM (AFM)
description:
Our goal as Angaliba is
mindset change throughCulture &education.
At Angaliba Radio, our broadcasting services provide a diverse range of viewpoints that enrich the social, political and cultural fabric of Malawian society and contribute to public interest outcomes.
Radio Frequencies: Southern Region: 87.7 MHZ | Central & Eastern Region : 93.5 MHZ | Northern Region : 101.7 MHZ

name: Umunthu FM
description:
Umunthu FM is a newly established radio Station licensed by Malawi Communication and Regulatory Authority (MACRA) in December 2020 as a Regional Commercial Radio Station.

 The station is based at Nkhotakota Boma and its catchment area is the entire Central Region of Malawi and the surrounding areas. Currently you can catch us on 87.7 MHZ and online
	Show more

name: Love FM
description: Love FM aims at providing high quality, professional and reliable information services in radio broadcasting that exceeds the expectations of people living in the communities.

name: Ufulu Fm Radio
description: Ufulu FM 92.5 provides an established platform from which manufactures, retailers, and service providers can at minimal cost, bring products and services to the attention of their existing or potential customers.

name: EI Radio
description: E I Radio is an exclusive Christian Entertainment News and Music Station

name: Linga FM
description: Linga FM is a radio station from Malawi, Lilongwe providing big variety of music.

name: Blantyre Synod Radio
description:
Proclaiming The Gospel Of Our Lord Jesus  Christ.
SOUTHERN REGION:   91.1FM
CENTRAL REGION: 100.3FM
NORTHERN REGION: 103.5FM

name: Mudziwathu Radio
description:
Mudziwathu Radio Station is a community radio station established in 2006.
Mudziwathu radio station has proved to be a darling to its listenership in Mchinji part of Lilongwe, Kasungu, Dowa and parts of Zambia and Mozambique and has  52 listening clubs in various parts of Mchinji.

name: Dziko FM
description: Dziko FM broadcasts live from Malawi's capital, Lilongwe on 103.6 FM across the Central Region and 105.1 FM in the Northern Region.

name: Dziko fm
description: Station bringing you the best in a variety of music,news, sports and entertainment

name: Timveni Radio
description: Children and youth Media

name: TWR Malawi
description:
TWR Malawi is a non-denominational, not-for-profit Christian radio network reaching Malawians and beyond, operating  24 hours in English, Chichewa, Chitumbuka and Chiyao on Ten FM channels.
Dedza 98.5 MHZ, Mchinji 96.7 MHZ, Lilongwe 106.3 MHZ, Blantyre 90.6 MHZ, Dowa 93.9 MHZ, Mangochi 105.7 MHZ,Mzuzu 106.3 MHZ,Ntchisi 90.7 MHZ,Thyolo 101.8 MHZ, Zomba 106.3MHZ, Karonga 91.4 MHZ

name: Radio Tigabane
description:
Radio Tigabane is a local radio broadcasting under the regional community of interest license issued by MACRA and operates under the patronage of the Catholic Diocese of Mzuzu. Radio Tigabane was officially launched on-air in December 2005. Situated in the growing city of Mzuzu in the northern region of Malawi, the station broadcasts to the wider part of the northern region covering the districts of Rumphi, Nkhata-Bay, Likoma, Mzimba, Mzuzu city and surrounding areas, it also reaches some parts of Kasungu.
Radio Tigabane broadcasts on the following frequencies 95.5 MHZ in Mzuzu, 95.9 MHZ in Chikangawa and 88.1 MHZ in Jenda.

name: Kasupe Radio
description: Kasupe Radio is an interactive platform established to promote sustainable systematic business solutions that support young people to do business in their respective communities in Malawi and across the globe. We use our professional network of experts to share real time business information in order to solve business problems. As a trusted and indispensable source of business information, we strive to help our audience to make informed business decisions to grow in their various sectors

name: Radio Bembeke FM
description: Radio Bembeke 97.3 FM is a non-profit making media house licensed with the Registrar Of Companies as a private limited company under the limited companies

name: Tuntufye Radio Fm
description:
In Karonga you can hear Tuntufye FM on 91.8FM, in Chitipa on 98.4FM, Livingstonia on 103.0 FM and in Mzuzu on 98.7FM.
Tuntufye Fm Radio-Your Good News and Development Radio Station

name: PLFM Radio
description: PLFM Radio is a contemporary National Radio Station broadcasting from Malawi's Capital City, Lilongwe. PLFM broadcasts on the following frequencies: 102.2 MHZ in Mzuzu, 88.8 MHZ in Lilongwe, 107.1 MHZ in Blantyre and 98.4 MHZ in Zomba.

name: Voice of Livingstonia (VoL)
description: Voice of Livingstonia (VoL) Radio is a Christian radio, licensed by the Malawi Communications Regulatory Authority (Macra), in 2012. It is owned by the CCAP Synod of Livingstonia.Through its diverse programming thematic range, which covers religion and culture; development and good governance; business and economy; agriculture; health; gender, children and social welfare; environment and climate change; and education; sports and entertainment, among others, VoL aims at meeting the needs of the listener holistically, be it spiritually or physically.

name: Nkhotakota Community Radio
description: Nkhotakota Community Radio Station - Nkhotakota CRS is a Community Broadcaster with a MACRA license. The station began airing on November 23, 2003, after it was established in 2001. The Nkhotakota Community Radio Station aims to encourage community involvement in development efforts.

name: Vibe Radio
description: Vibe Radio is simply  the best Malawi's online radio

name: Times Radio Malawi
description: Times Radio Malawi this being an independent radio station and source of well balanced news and programming. With over 95% local programming, 50% of which are in Chichewa, our goal is to deliver radio experience that engages all Malawians at different social economic levels.

name: Zodiak Radio
description: Zodiak Broadcasting Station is a radio station that has special interest with the rural communities without necessarily neglecting the urban communities. We are truly independent with an editorial policy that dictates us to be non partisan, responsible independent while tackling issues that effect the masses without fear of favour. We broadcast to the nation from our state of the art transmission studio in Lilongwe in Artbridge House.

name: MobiSchool
description: An interactive multi-channel education delivery using technology to open access to education content for learners, on-demand.
